event.description:
Roy Smoothe CEO of Just Cool CEO and the world famous Smoothe Mixx Production Studios will be joining us in the BRAND NEW John Henry Brookes building, room 208!! Smoothe will be discussing his background in Business and Entrepreneurship, his current and previous projects, building on failure and useful selling tips and advice.

Smoothe has an excellent business knowledge and plenty of experience giving interesting, motivational talks and presentations...

"Enjoyed doing business with Roy. On a personal level he is quite a funny guy, great to deal with, and a professional" -IBM Senior Executives  

 "The event we attended organized by Roy was superb. I had a great time it was one of the best of it's kind I have been to." -Senior Executive: British Airways

"Roy's commitment and persistence is admirable" -Senior Executive: Coca-Cola Enterprises 

This will be an excellent event for those thinking of starting their own business and anyone with an interest in entrepreneurship AND as an added incentive to snap these tickets up, Roy will be distributing FREE movies to the first 50 attendees!
event.title: Roy Smoothe Talk: CEO of 'Just Cool'
